item.title: Deep Learning Introduction
item.description: Deep Learning DL is a field of ML that is primarily concerned with the learning of representations of data. At the core of DL is the use of MLP, used to model these representations.

item.title: Estimation Theory
item.description: Estimation Theory Algorithms = "" Weighted Least-Squares Estimation The Weighted Least-Squares Estimation method is an application of the Generalized Least-Squares (GLS) algorithm, which aims at estimating unknown parameters ($\bm{\beta}$) in a linear regression model, given a set of observations ($\bm{z}$), where there is a certain degree of correlation ($\bm{W}$) between the residuals ($\bm{\epsilon}$) in the regression model.
